title: The Sweet Potato Queens' Book of Love
description: The best-selling Sweet Potato Queens bring their unique brand of "spunky advice on beauty, life and love" ( People magazine) to our Miniature Editionâ„¢ line in this abridgment of The Sweet Potato Queens' Book of Love, complete with outrageous humor and insight, plus sparkly charm on a ribbon marker. "Unlike other beauty queens, the Jackson, Miss., Sweet Potato Queens are self-crowned, rule for life ... and are real women--figure flaws and all. This buoyantly funny guide to life and love is a hoot from the get-go as ringleader Browne offers queenly observations on life's most pressing issues. --Publisher's Weekly
author: Jill Conner Browne
